attributes.action: Drop the minimal voting age for future referendums to sixteen across the UK
attributes.additional_details: To permit sixteen and seventeen year olds across the United Kingdom to be given the right to vote in all future national referendums.
attributes.background: Following the EU referendum, it would be just to give both sixteen and seventeen year olds a say in referendums that will equally impact them, as much as people above the current voting age.
